downloadTitle: Bringing Your Company's Business System Up to Date
downloadDescription: This white paper explores how you can use Microsoft Dynamics AX to support rapid growth and drive business success.
detailsSection: Microsoft recently researched the experience of nearly 200 companies with more than 250 PCs that have deployed one or more of the applications in the Microsoft Dynamics line of business management solutions. Among these companies, a common issue was rapid growth. The pain points most often cited were manual processes that cause mistakes and inefficiencies, the need for more functionalities, an inability to scale to support growth, integration problems, especially with the growing number of customer and partner systems, and a lack of operational insight. This white paper explores how you can use Microsoft Dynamics AX to support rapid growth and drive business success.
systemRequirementsSection: The following is also required: Adobe Reader (download Adobe Reader)
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:

  • Download the file by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.

  • Open this document in Adobe Reader to read or print it.


To remove this download:
